doc.title: French Heat
doc.plot: Some tourists come to France for the food, the fine wine, and the culture. The smart folks come for the sex - and the French prove that lust is their ultimate tourist attraction! European cuties Antoinette Zoe, Debra D. Annette, Emile A. Devos are vivacious and energetic! The feisty and flirty French Femmes certainly liven up the screen with their intimate brand of French foreplay! Scenarios jump from a swinging restaurant where a Countess enjoys a mouth-watering item that isn't on the menu - to a stud who puts his mountain-climbing skills to good use on two very buxom women! And that's just the beginning of your personal tour through the world's lusties land... French Heat will show you all the hot spots!
